CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 16, 1959, pg. 27, reads: "Tommy Smith All-Stars - The Tommy Smith All-Stars, defending champions of the Ammon Slow Pitch League, again are listed among the favorite for loop supremacy.  Members of the team are, left to right, front row: Josh Gibson, Joe Atkins, Charles Lewis, Frank Stotts, George Pennix, Hamp Sandrige, Norris Cohey and Jimmy Atkins.  Standing: Fuzzy Walton, manager; Ernie Butler, Charles Holt, William Woodson, Gabe Patterson, Bill Johnson, Daniel Nevells, Wendell Austin, Harry Holt, Jeep Johnson and Tommy Smith, owner.  Not shown is Chick Jones, business manager. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Tommy Smith All Stars softball team, front row from left: Josh Gibson, Joe Atkins, Charles Lewis, Frank Stotts, George Pennix, Hamp Sandrige, Norris Cohey, Jimmy Atkins; standing: manager Fuzzy Walton, Ernie Butler, Charles Holt, William Woodson, Gabe Patterson, Bill Johnson, Daniel Nevells, Wendell Austin, Harry Holt, Jeep Johnson and Thomas J. "Tommy" Smith, on Ammon Field
